summary: A group of youngsters go out to a disco on Christmas Eve and accidentally run into a shepherd who has prepared himself for a night of pure insanity.
cast: Vincent Cassel|Olivier Barthélémy|Roxane Mesquida|Nico Le Phat Tan|Leïla Bekhti|Ladj Ly|Julie-Marie Parmentier|Gérald Thomassin|Quentin Lasbazeilles|Guillaume Bacquet|Alexandre Borrel|Georgette Crochon|François Levantal|Monica Bellucci|Oxmo Puccino|Paule Abecassis|Mouloud Achour|Tarubi|Mokobé Traoré|Romain Gavras
title: Sheitan
